name: Saoshyant Page Builder
author: Saoshyant.1994

sections.description:
with saoshyant page builder, anyone can quickly become a web designer and try building their own web design,
without any prior experience. saoshyant page builder like a number of other plugins in our post,
offers a front-end drag & drop page building solution that works through widgets
modules, and layout options to help bloggers create exciting and stunning designs that feel,.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. go the edit or create page and switch sao page builder
